name: OYS/ 8
description:
Over Your Shoulder (I was looking for the truth)
-----
/My mother’s aunt, she was an immigrant too, she went to Canada like her children and her brothers and sister/
/After all her three children became mothers and fathers in Canada, she came back to Iran and bought two pieces of farm ground which are now gardens of pomegranate too/
/She is 2 years younger than my grandma, my grandma’s best friend and now they are reunited in the village after years apart/
-----

35mm photography from OYS series/ I often walk slow, I like to wait and watch people from behind. A photo from someone’s back is a proof of his/her existence in that time and place. It says nothing more, it shows very few details about that person. Only that they are humans. In OYS, I explore stories of people you don’t see their faces in between notes
